name: Sky Rush
description:
Prepare for adrenaline inducing speedrunning while venturing through the different worlds of Sky Rush.

In this first person platform game you will run, jump and bounce as fast as you can through 3 colourful levels in the sky. Use your grappling hook, sprint on walls and watch out for moving and falling platforms to get through every level.

Don't forget to activate the runes along the way to unlock your door to safety. Compete with yourself and friends in this exciting time trial. Whether you believe in heaven or not, the sky has a lot to offer.

Programming: Melvin Olsson, Annika Zarske
3D Art: Celine Jaarnek
2D Art: Ellen Jacobson
Sound: Rasmus Johansson
Design: Simon Liedgren, Rasmus Johansson, Melvin Olsson
